hero.title: Find the Perfect Chef for Any Occasion
hero.subtitle: From intimate in-home dining to large-scale corporate events, Needachef connects you with top-tier culinary professionals. Experience excellence, reliability, and unforgettable flavors.

services.title: Our Culinary Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of services to meet your culinary needs. Whether you're a business seeking support or an individual looking for a private chef, we have a solution for you.

promo.title: Launch Your Food Brand
promo.text: From product development to branding and marketing, we provide the expertise to turn your culinary ideas into a successful business. Let us help you tell your story and captivate your audience.

servicesPage.title: Explore Our Services
servicesPage.intro: Discover the wide array of professional culinary and hospitality solutions we provide. Our commitment is to deliver excellence and elevate standards in every kitchen we touch.

partnersPage.title: Partner with Needachef
partnersPage.intro: Join our network of partners and offer your clients an exclusive culinary experience. We work with hotels, short-let platforms, and tour operators to provide seamless chef booking services.
partnersPage.widgetText: Add a "Book a Chef" button to your website with one simple line of code. It's the easiest way to provide a premium service to your guests and track your referrals.
partnersPage.widgetAlertText: Our script adds a non-intrusive button to the bottom-right corner of your site. When clicked, a pop-up form appears, allowing users to book a chef without leaving your page. We handle the rest!

chefApplicationPage.title: Join Our Culinary Team
chefApplicationPage.intro: Complete the application below to start your journey with Needachef. We are looking for passionate and talented chefs to join our network.
